message: Website itself here: http://qrcard.us/ – Also, the Haskell vCard implementation I wrote here: http://hackage.haskell.org/package/hs-vcard
I like the concept and the amount of information you're able to encapsulate, but I wonder how, for business people, you can integrate their brand identity effectively.

@Aranjedeath Good question, thanks. I'm totally willing to do custom cards / work with their existing design. I grew up in a print shop, and my mom is working on this, so between the two of us we have plenty of design experience (and ideas on how to further this) in order to effectively do just that.
Thanks, please let me know what you think and if you have any feedback!
